scenario.name: Basic UAS responder
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[field1] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: [field3] <sip:[field0]@[field1]>;tag=[call_number] To: [field3] <sip:[field0]@[field1]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Contact: [field3] <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Expires: 3600 Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, OPTIONS, BYE, REFER, NOTIFY, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, INFO Content-Length: 0 User-Agent: SIPp

REGISTER sip:[field1] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: [field3] <sip:[field0]@[field1]>;tag=[call_number] To: [field3] <sip:[field0]@[field1]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 REGISTER Contact: [field3] <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Expires: 3600 Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, OPTIONS, BYE, REFER, NOTIFY, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, INFO Content-Length: 0 User-Agent: SIPp [field2]
